nodes.text: Janex was a Pantoran female Dalnan who was part of a delegation that was to be sent from Dalna to meet with the Galactic Republic at the Starlight Beacon aboard the Steady Wing. The Dalnan ambassador Weft asked his son, Honesty, to greet Janex and the rest of the delegation when they arrived on the ship. When the Steady Wing was attacked by Nihil pirates after its departure, Janex and the rest of the delegation, save Honesty, died when the ship was destroyed.
